data.subject: Who Can I Turn To (From `The Shadow Of Your Smile`)

The shadow of your smile
 When you are gone
 Will color all my dreams

data.subject: Fly Me To The Moon (From `The Shadow Of Your Smile`)

data.subject: Day By Day (From `The Shadow Of Your Smile`)
data.lyric:

data.subject: Aruanda (From `The Shadow Of Your Smile`)
data.lyric:

e, so eu sei
